text: (Nk’uko twahishuriye intumwa zakubanjirije, yewe Muhamadi) ni na ko twaguhishuriye Qur’an ku bw’itegeko ryacu. Mbere yo guhishurirwa ntabwo wari uzi igitabo (Qur’an), ndetse nta n’ubwo wari usobanukiwe ukwemera. Ariko (Qur’an) twayigize urumuri tuyoboresha abo dushaka mu bagaragu bacu. Mu by’ukuri wowe uyobora (abantu) inzira igororotse
